de.hu.gralog.beans.support
Class DefaultPropertyChangeListenableBean

java.lang.Object
  de.hu.gralog.beans.support.DefaultPropertyChangeListenableBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListenable, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DefaultPropertyAndDisplayChangeListenableBean
public class DefaultPropertyChangeListenableBean
extends Object
implements PropertyChangeListenable, Serializable

This class is a helper class to implement the PropertyChangeListenable interface. It administers the listeners and provides methods to fire PropertyChangeEvents. You should subclass this class to define a bean that allows others to listen to changes of it's properties.

Author:
Sebastian
